document_data.mainbody:
arsor yi Tashluta was an enforcer in the service of the Rundeen in 1370 DR.
Sarsor was a yuan-ti pureblood of the SeSehen tribe in Tashalar. With the support of the Grand Yrshelem, who knew his true heritage, he infiltrated the Rundeen under the alias of a contortionist from Tashluta. He used his racial abilities to twist his body in order to grapple the people he was ordered to punish, which gave him the nickname the Rope.
